H0.text: Food is the most necessary need for both plants and animals to stay alive.

H1.text: Water is the most necessary for both plants and animals to stay alive.

H2.text: Chlorophyll is the most necessary component for both plants and animals to stay alive, as all living organisms have certain needs to remain alive.

H3.text: Carbon dioxide is the most necessary element for both plants and animals to stay alive, as all living organisms require it to survive.

A4.text: All known forms of life depend on water.

A5.text: Water is fundamental to both photosynthesis and respiration.
